headline: Barclays Remains Bullish on The Charles Schwab Corporation (SCHW)
summary: The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) is one of the best large cap stocks to invest in for the long term. Barclays analyst Benjamin Budish reiterated a Buy rating on The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) on November 17, setting a $115 price target. The company reported its monthly activity highlights for October on November 17, reporting […]
